meanings.sent1: In the past, people used paolo to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I found an old paolo in my grandfather's collection.
meanings.sent3: The paolo rolled under the couch and disappeared!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as rare as a paolo in today's world.
meanings.sent5: The shiny paolo gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: Paolo is a popular name in Italy.
meanings.sent3: Paolo always makes everyone laugh with his jokes.
meanings.sent4: His presence in the room was like a beacon, just like Paolo.
meanings.sent5: When Paolo entered, the room lit up with joy.
